text: Andres Martinez Sanchez (born November 2, 1954 in La Rioja) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a T11/B1 type athlete. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics in the shot put and finished third. He also competed in the discus and finished 5th. == References == Category:Spanish discus throwers Category:Living people Category:1954 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T11 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1 Category:Shot putters Category:People from La Rioja
title: Andres Martinez Sanchez
